but I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and I have <S%H7760>made<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and [appointed] his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for the <S%H8565>jackals<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> "

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "We have been <S%H7567>beaten<s%> <S%H7567>down,<s%> but we will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> up the <S%H2723>ruins<s%>"; <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "They may <S%H1129>build,<s%> but I will <S%H2040>tear<s%> <S%H2040>down;<s%> and [men] will <S%H7121>call<s%> them the <S%H7562>wicked<s%> <S%H1366>territory,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> toward <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2194>indignant<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>"

With <S%H2088>such<s%> an offering on your <S%H3027>part,<s%> will He <S%H5375>receive<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of you <S%H6440>kindly<s%>?" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> that there were one among you who would <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>gates,<s%> that you might not <S%H2600>uselessly<s%> <S%H215>kindle<s%> [fire on] My <S%H4196>altar!<s%> I am not <S%H2656>pleased<s%> with you," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3808>"nor<s%> will I <S%H7521>accept<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> from you.

And you <S%H5301>disdainfully<s%> <S%H5301>sniff<s%> at it," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "and you <S%H935>bring<s%> what was <S%H1497>taken<s%> by <S%H1497>robbery,<s%> and [what is] <S%H6455>lame<s%> or <S%H2470>sick;<s%> so you <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H4503>offering!<s%> Should I <S%H7521>receive<s%> that from your <S%H3027>hand<s%>?" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
